Legal_Issue: Whether wilfulness is an essential element under subsection 53(1) of the Patent Act for a patent to be invalidated due to untrue material allegations
Evidence_Assessment: Assessment of whether material allegations in the patent petition were untrue
Burden_of_Proof: On the party alleging invalidity to demonstrate untrue material allegations
Credibility_Factor: Not explicitly addressed, but relevance of past cases cited by Teva considered
Legal_Rule: A patent is void under subsection 53(1) if any material allegation in the petition is untrue
Standard_of_Review: Plenary standard – whether the requirement of wilfulness is plainly and obviously required
Procedural_Issue: Teva's motion to strike Apotex's defense
Grounds_for_Claim: Untrue material allegations in the patent application
Outcome_on_Merits: Wilfulness not required; Apotex's defense allowed to proceed
Review_Standard: Plainly and obviously interpretation of statutory provision
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Prothonotary did not err in allowing Apotex's defense
Key_Evidence_Considered: Material allegations in the patent petition, case law cited by Teva
Applicant_Challenge: Apotex challenged validity of Teva's patent
Court_Result: Teva's appeal dismissed; costs awarded to Apotex
Legal_Rule_Source: Statutory: Patent Act, s. 53(1); Case law references
Standard_of_Proof: Balance of probabilities (implied in civil patent dispute)
Defendant_Response: Apotex asserted patent invalidity as defense to infringement claim
Remedy_Requested: Teva requested striking of Apotex's defense
Outcome: Defense not struck; case allowed to continue
Remedy_Sought: Invalidation of patent based on untrue allegations
Resolution_Mechanism: Judicial determination on motion to strike
Claimant_Status: Teva as plaintiff in infringement action
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Allegation of untrue material statements in patent petition
Applicable_Process: Motion to strike, followed by appeal
Pending_Relief_or_Application: Apotex's defense of patent invalidity remains in play
